answers.answer: Are you keeping a close eye on your diabetes a blood pressure? Can you get in to see your Dr today? It very could be your anxiety. There is such a long list of symptoms. You could be getting a virus though. They're sure going around this time of year.

I did go to the doc today she checked me out an did a urine sample.  She said I've prob got the sinus stuff going on due to the weather.  I just still don't feel right!  My vision feels weird, kinda like its cloudy.  An I have a weird feeling in my upper stomach(kinda hard to explain). I know anxiety van cause lots if things but I just don't understand how you can know FORSURE that its just anxiety??!!  I need to give the Zoloft a chance but I'm so afraid of the possibility of the side effects an that it will make me feel even stranger.....

question: Brief history, I'm 32 yr old female, overweight, high blood pressure an pre diabetic.  I also suffer from anxiety.Fox the last four days I have felt so weird!!  It's kinda hard to explain but ill try my best.  I had to force myself to go to work for 3 days while I was there it was like i couldn't sit still, my face was flushed an I was hot feeling.  Then once I got home I would calm down a little but I just kept getting weird feelings, a strange feeling in my upper stomach, an a feelings that something was really wrong.  I couldn't go to sleep last night, I just sat there worrying.  So when I got up this am I was still feeling weird so I ended up calling in an I did slept in a little bit.  However I still just don't feel right.I'm really worried that something is really wrong with me....I just don't know what to do??  How do you determine that its just anxiety an not anything more??  What do I do to not feel this way??  Please help me!!!!!!
title: i think im going nuts!!
